title: Every FTSE 100 company is audited by a Big Four firm, research shows
text:
Every blue chip British company is now audited by one of the scandal-hit Big Four accountants, regulators have revealed - sparking demands for a sweeping shake-up.

All FTSE 100 businesses have one of the so-called Big Four signing off on their books, according to the Financial Reporting Council (FRC), squeezing smaller rivals out of the top tier. A year earlier, one firm in the FTSE was audited by a smaller rival.

It will be seen as a blow for competition in accountancy amid efforts to improve the industry following a string of gaffes and fines.
